# The `circular_raw_ostream` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> - A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> which <em>can</em> save its data to a circular buffer, or can pass it through directly to an underlying stream if specified with a buffer of zero. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::circular_raw_ostream</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> - A <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> which <em>can</em> save its data to a circular buffer, or can pass it through directly to an underlying stream if specified with a buffer of zero.

Definition at line 24 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/circular-raw-ostream-h">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream.h</a>.

<SectionDefinition>

## Public Constructors

### circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream() {#a42664fb7b2765468ff290e0b46cbb079}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>llvm::circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream::circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp; Stream, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; Header, size&#95;t BuffSize=0, bool Owns=<a href="#a70524ecd20bbff380a56e850d7ad0f2d">REFERENCE&#95;ONLY</a>)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> - Construct an optionally circular-buffered stream, handing it an underlying stream to do the &quot;real&quot; output.

As a side effect, if BuffSize is nonzero, the given Stream is set to be Unbuffered. This is because <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> does its own buffering, so it doesn&#39;t want another layer of buffering to be happening underneath it.

&quot;Owns&quot; tells the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/circular-raw-ostream">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream</a> whether it is responsible for managing the held stream, doing memory management of it, etc.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/circular-raw-ostream-h/#l00107">107</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/circular-raw-ostream-h">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>

### is&#95;displayed() {#a35b76de8502785e9e581e759d51078b9}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream::is&#95;displayed () const</>}
  labels = {["inline", "virtual"]}>
This function determines if this stream is connected to a &quot;tty&quot; or &quot;console&quot; window.

That is, the output would be displayed to the user rather than being put on a pipe or stored in a file.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/circular-raw-ostream-h/#l00124">124</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/circular-raw-ostream-h">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream.h</a>.

### write&#95;impl() {#a2ee50576858d121ba88b01d7b507207f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream::write&#95;impl (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> char &#42; Ptr, size&#95;t Size)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
The is the piece of the class that is implemented by subclasses.

This writes the <code>Size</code> bytes starting at <code>Ptr</code> to the underlying stream.

This function is guaranteed to only be called at a point at which it is safe for the subclass to install a new buffer via SetBuffer.


<ParametersList title="Parameters">
<ParametersListItem name="Ptr">The start of the data to be written. For buffered streams this is guaranteed to be the start of the buffer.</ParametersListItem>
<ParametersListItem name="Size">The number of bytes to be written.</ParametersListItem>
</ParametersList>

<SectionUser title="Invariant">
&#123; Size &gt; 0 &#125;
</SectionUser>

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/circular-raw-ostream-h/#l00082">82</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/circular-raw-ostream-h">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/circular-raw-ostream-cpp/#l00017">17</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/circular-raw-ostream-cpp">circular&#95;raw&#95;ostream.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
